workshop.title: MySQL Deployment using Infrastructure as Code
workshop.description: These labs will give you a basic understanding of Develope Cloud Service infrastrusture concepts and deployments

versions.name: Trial Account
versions.description: Develop and deploy with Developer Cloud Service to perform this workshop

labs.title: Introduction
labs.description: Obtain an Oracle Cloud Trial Account

labs.title: Lab 100: Infratructure as Code
labs.description: Setting up the Infrastructure using Developer Cloud Service to provision a Compute Instance running MYSQL

labs.title: Lab 200: AlphaOffice Application Deployment
labs.description: Deployment into Application Container Cloud Service

labs.title: Lab 300: AlphaOffice CI/CD
labs.description: Make changes to the AlphaOffice application to re-build and re-deploy
